product.name: Face-Shield
product.description: This Face-shield is a fully Certified (EN-166) re-usable and robust face protector designed to be used as an aid to help prevent the contamination of the wearer from fluids such as splashes and droplets from external sources.

product.name: Disposable Aprons - 100
product.description: The Disposable Aprons are white disposable polythene aprons with halter neck and waist ties. They are supplied in a convenient flat pack which allows easy, non-stick removal of each apron.

product.description: Full-back isolation gowns are designed to help staff achieve full coverage every time.
